titleStmt.title: A discourse not altogether vnprofitable, nor vnpleasant for such as are desirous to know the situation and customes of forraine cities without trauelling to see them Containing a discourse of all those citties wherein doe flourish at this day priuiledged vniuersities. Written by Samuel Levvkenor Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Lewkenor, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by I[ohn] W[indet] for Humfrey Hooper, and are to be sold at his shop in Chauncery lane, at the signe of the Beare,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Chauncery lane, at the signe of the Beare
